评论详情: Beautiful skirt- I was the best Mrs Claus ever!

Very nice skirt to create an outfit! Love the material, it is quite comfortable! Wore it all day twice already at a Charles Dickens event and for a Vintage Train Station event! If you are on the fence about sizing go smaller - I ordered a XXL but could have gone with an XL I think.
This skirt is beautiful! Looks well made. I'm 4'11" so it's a tad long, but it will work .

评论概述: It’s okay.  Fabric was a little unexpected.
评论详情: Since it would have only been worn 3 days a year, would have kept it even though the fabric wasn’t the greatest, if it had been a solid black.  Witches Luncheon.  Witches High Tea.  & Halloween.

I wear 1800 style clothing for my work and this skirt absolutely met all my expectations and then some!!! For me, I like 1. the perfect length; it slightly covers my boots. 2. The elastic band; offers comfortable flexibility for physically demanding work. (And for weight gain or loss) 3.The pin striped pattern; goes with any blouse or apron. 4.Material; soft and cool for hotter months! Feels wonderful inside and out! Excellent! I will only buy from this company from now on!

For reference, I'm 5'3" and 150 pounds and for once when buying non-petite (L), I don't have to alter either the hem or the waist. The skirt falls to the ankles and I can wear very low heels without the skirt appearing too long. I could wear flats and it would still be fine. I was frankly surprised at how well constructed the skirt is and the silky thickness of the fabric. Interior seams are well-finished and the strings to pull the vertical gathering at the front are self-fabric and sturdy. The elasticized waist is wide enough that it doesn't roll, but not so wide that it cannot be concealed by a belt. It's comfortable and a little unusual in design. It can be worn funky-style with cowboy boots, a tank top and denim jacket, Little House on the Prarie too prim for words style with no flounce at all, a buttoned down blouse and ankle boots, WWI era with a high necked blouse, short fitted jacket and heels or Goth with a long sleeved, form-fitting top, lace gloves and chunky laced up boots. Good quality and versatile- I recommend it particularly for shorter women like myself because it's wearable right out of the package without alterations.
I felt so cute and enjoyed wearing this for the first time today. I got so many compliments!!! Love it so much! I would definitely buy it again
The skirt fits perfectly!!!! Great quality of fabric!!!

I love this skirt!! Bought it to use for renfest and it goes great with everything I've tried on so far. The fabric it's much better than expected and flowing but not hot or heavy. I also like that it's not too long so it doesn't drag on the floor. Bought a size 3X and I usually wear 2X bottoms.
Fit was great.  Material quality was much better than expected
The overall fit and look was absolutely perfect
As described, true to size, was able to wear right out of the package without needing any alterations.
I should’ve ordered a smaller size I got I guess 2 XL. I thought I got XL but I’m hoping it doesn’t slip down. I’ll have to pin it but it’s a beautiful skirt specially for a western theme or float.

I ordered a size up to get the right fit and it was too long. I was disappointed because it is a very nice skirt. I am 5’4” and 250 lbs. it was snug around the waist but I could have still worn it if it were not so long. I normally wear 2x or size 20. For this I ordered a 3x
I used this skirt for a holloween costume. Skirt is as depicted. Well made and fits nicely.
I wore for a Halloween costume and it did the job
I’m petite and this was one of the few skirts I found that worked. It’s well made for a costume dress.
This skirt is just what I was looking for . I might even order another in a different color. I haven't got to wear it yet though. But I think it's going to be perfect.

I wore this dress to be Eudoria Holmes to dress up with my daughter who was Enola Holmes for Halloween. It is super flattering, high quality, and the pickups really bring it to life. The waistband is stretchy and I put one of my belts over it. Got so many compliments!
Works well for what I needed it for. Good fit, well made. Makes me wish I wore skirts besides Halloween.
I am wearing this as Disney's Newsies Hannah and I love it! It looks great on stage and elevated my look.

Exceptional quality and detail, fits as expected. I returned it, however, because there was no black in the stripe, which had been in description. Just too light for my costume. I bought it again in a different color.
The quality and material of this skirt is amazing. Wonderful! I love it.
Comfortable and easy to wear. Looks fantastic!

评论概述: Had to reorder as this one was not delivered. Nice product when my second order arriveredrr
评论详情: Not delivered until I had to replace the first time it was ordered.

Love the easy-to-use gathering feature hidden under the first layer. Also like the fact that there is no “front” or “back.” It can be worn either way. For this event, I wore the ruffles in front. Next time I may swivel the ruffles to the back and wear a bustle underneath.  Note: I recommend buying your usual size. I sized up and regretted it.
Love it. Perfect for our Mother’s Day tea.
The description is false. Its grey and white. Not black and white. What was sent to me was NOT pictured.

评论概述: Polyester…do I need to say more?
评论详情: Why is nothing made with cotton anymore? This is cute, but only good for a costume as the material is pretty thin and obviously polyester. It’s fine though.

This skirt is adorable. Perfect for costume purposes. It's very well made and the material is nice but my 3X was more like a Large. Not sure if the smaller sizes run small but this one sure did. I can't use it at all but I may find someone who can fit into it.

The skirt fit well enough, but the fabric felt like cheap plastic. It was also supposed to be black with white pinstripes, what I got was as though a comic book shader had been printed onto it to add the darker stripes. Any time I moved it was a terrible sound.  Overall, it'd be good for a costume, but nothing more.
Well made, easy to wear skirt with Victorian style. I received many compliments from students and faculty on our dress like a book character day.
Great quality. Vibrant color. Fits as expected.
I bought the skirt for the founders day.
This skirt is one of my faves. I do have a petticoat underneath to give it a fullness but the material and everything is perfect. It does my haunted tour justice.

Well made- adjustable ruffle was a great feature. I wore this with a medium hoop to match 1890 era but is can be worn with no hoop. This was a good price range and the quality was better than I expected.
It fit fine and I am a 2x. The fabric was fine.
Super cute comfortable skirt it's adjustable as far as pulling it up.

Are usually wear a large but by the size chart I bought an extra large  I could’ve probably stayed with a large and it would fit me a little bit better but it’s very attractive I bought it to wear  for a  early 1900’s  show  was very nice

评论概述: "black-gray white" style is fully gray and white
评论详情: The tag was sewn on the inside front and not back, it is not black at all but gray and white. And it's a bit tighter for what I expected. Overall decent quality but not what I'm looking for.

I weee a 18-20 size pants and I like to not feel suffocated in my clothes. This 3xl fit perfectly with a bit of extra space. I’m very happy with how it fit. It’s a gray/white color and I was hopeful for a black and white.
The skirt is made out of high-quality fabric a great night to yesteryear if you’re looking for nostalgia from the 1800s style and this is your item.
was grey and white-not black grey and white but seems really nice-justwhat i wanted

I didn't realize this at first, but the skirt is adjustable to create the gathered effect. There are fabric strings underneath the first layer. Fit-wise, it's true to size. I ordered a L, and I normally wear a 12 or 14 in skirts. Length-wise, I'm 5'11", and it came down to my ankles. Kind of an awkward length, but cute enough for a Western-themed event. I put a crinoline underneath to give it more volume. This was a huge hit at a Western themed event.

评论概述: So impressed with look and quality!
评论详情: I was pleasantly surprised by look and quality of this skirt!  I was half expecting cheap Halloween quality material and for it to be sloppily sewn together.  But I am very pleased it's much better than that.  I wore it for our annual Round Up Sunday at church and I got so many compliments all day long.  I'm for sure gonna order one of each color!
Loved it! Good fabric, fit and was very flattering!

评论概述: Love the skirt very very well made
评论详情: He would be very satisfied with this product the fabric is great it is very well-made
Excellent quality, great fit. Used at a western themed party and everyone loved the skirt.

I purchased this in a medium for cosplay, and I love it! I thought the bustle would be more adjustable to get more of a steampunk skirt look, but the bustle doesn't really come up that high to show a lot of leg. It is also in the back of the skirt? I guess it can be worn both ways. With the bustle in the back, It would look great with some thuling or a hoop and a piece to make your butt stick out (can't remember what that is called). I plan to wear it as is because I love it--I can still steam punk it out some. I purchased the burgundy stripe and was worried that the stripe would be to white. It is more winter white or cream.

评论概述: A bit better than what I expected. Pretty pleased.
评论详情: Bought this to build a Victorian maid costume for Halloween in a few months but also wanted to wear it prior and after. The material is thick-ish not really sure how to describe it. The ruffles are beautiful and just like so many have commented the strings for synching the ruffles up were sewn into the "back". Yes, the tag was on the same side but personally I'm just happy they were there as a few said they didn't get any! Very beautiful skirt and I'm glad I took the chance.

评论概述: Love it--perfect for my steampunk librarian look!
评论详情: I love this skirt! It's pretty and comfortable. It also works great for my steampunk librarian look. I have it in 2 colors so far.
It fits as described - great skirt for saloon girl or 1890s-era.
It does not look like the picture at all! It is poor quality, too big and they sent me grey instead of black! Rip off!!

This skirt seems very well-made and high quality. I am 5'9 and weigh around 150 lbs and the large fit but I could have also gone with a medium. Since it's a stretch waistband, the large still fit me very well.  I really love this skirt & I'm excited to look at other products Belle Poque sells.

评论概述: Regardless of the reviews, body types differ, be willing to adjust! Its worth it
评论详情: It is a lovely skirt, and i cant wait to get it in the right size

Sadly, the “black/gray white” is actually just light gray and white stripe. Not black and white at all, despite how it looks in the photos depicted. Also, the gathering goes all around the waist, making it fattening from a front-on view, as the hips flair out, not something most women want, haha. Too bad, because if it was slightly improved, I would have liked it. The lining was nice.

I bought this skirt for the color, pattern, and style, hoping the fabric would be right for my outfit. Once it arrived, I was happy to find that the skirt is made from a lovely silky fabric that is dressy but comfortable. Please note the strings on the inside that convert the skirt into different looks, if you haven't noticed already! I love that I can wear it gathered or not gathered, a wonderful perk. I dress up in different period attires for fun, across a variety of events. Two gathers works for my Victorian look, one gather for my pirate look, or straight no gathers for colonial. It is a brilliant item, thank you to the makers of this skirt!
This skirt is adorable. Well made with details that I didn’t expect. Love the option to gather the front as shown.
I was expecting this to look silly with my baby bump but is very flattering! I’m super pleased with the fit and the fact it’s not too long either! I would definitely buy this again in other colors

评论概述: Runs 2 sizes bigger than the size chart suggested
评论详情: Based on the size chart I would be a size L, but I ended up being a size Small. I did love that the striped skirt did not wrinkle, and doesnt get dirty easily (cause it poly) however it doesnt breath as well as a linen. Still loved the skirt despite the size issue!
I love it but the fabric they used makes it a bit noisy

This skirt is beautiful but not without some issues. One of the cords used to gather the sides was sewn into the hem and could not move to gather. I was able to make it work with just the other one. The rushing is in the back and not the front as shown. The elastic in the waist band twists within the casing. And a seam on the waistband frayed open. For the price, not bad but not perfect.  Be sure to use the manufacturer’s measurements. I usually wear an XL but with the manufacturer’s size guide I am a 2X which fit perfectly.

评论概述: Beautiful skirt at a great price!
评论详情: This skirt was the perfect fit for my Lady Suffragette Halloween costume, so much that I won a prize! The skirt fit well, doesn’t look cheap, and is such fun to wear. I definitely recommend for whatever occasion.
This skirt is perfection. It fits just right. It looks lovely on and off stage. I would order another color and style from this company.
This skirt is multi functional. With the right accessories, it can cover a lot of eras. Definitely recommend it.

评论概述: Item was not like the picture shown.
评论详情: This skirt was not attractive at all and was different than the picture shown.

评论概述: Super cute, great quality for price!
评论详情: Other reviews convinced me to buy and I’m so glad I did. Great quality for price. Fabric is lined well but overall light and flows beautifully. I bought a size large. It’s up on my waist and I generally am a size 10/12. I’m 5’2.75” but you can just see my toes and it doesn’t drag while I walk. I don’t mind the elastic on the front, but I can see how it could interfere with a tight, thin top. The stretch is just right to fit well, but not too tight or loose. Overall super glad I bought it.

I bought two of them in different colors and although the fit is pretty much the same, the fabrics are completely different. One is softer and more flexible and one is more rigid and stiff feeling. I was pleasantly surprised that they fit well, I am normally a 3x-4x and an apple shaped. Overall I am happy with the purchase I just wish it was more consistent.
I purchased this skirt as part of my Halloween costume and it was perfect. The quality is great and was exactly what I expected.
Perfect costume

Extremely well-made and comfortable skirt. I bought a 2X and 3X as I wasn’t sure what size would fit me the smaller ended up working and both are extraordinarily well-made and will look great in our upcoming historic Christmas parade. In order to get the ruffle there are two strings on the inside of the skirt on each side that you simply pull to set the kind of ruffle you want and then tie off. I was very pleased with these and I am sending the larger size back as the smaller fit me. These were very flattering on my size 18-20 frame.

评论概述: Great quality- looks and feels amazing!
评论详情: Bought this for Halloween costume and it is amazing quality! High quality fabric and stitching, looks great and is true to size. Definitely worth the few extra dollars to get something quality that fits well and will last!

评论概述: Belle Poque Women's Vintage Stripes Gothic Victorian Skirt Renaissance Style Falda
评论详情: This skirt is fabulous. The fabric is light weight and the way to gather the skirt is underneath and all you have to do is to pull them to cinch up the skirt. The elastic waste is wonderful and the fit is true to size. It does seem that the label is on the front of the skirt if you want the gather in the front. I cannot wait to wear my outfit.

Love the fit, swish, and length for this skirt. Downsides are that the material is a cheap, thin, polyester feeling fabric. It doesn’t feel as though it’ll last for many wears, which is disappointing because I had hoped to wear it more than just a few times. The black and white stripe is more of a dark grey and white stripe which is also a bit disappointing.  Also, there is no zipper in this skirt, it’s just a waist band with elastic in the back half. I wear a 14 pants and a medium or large t-shirt and the XL fit me very comfortably, with plenty of room to get it on over my head, and have some room at the waist.  Just a quick note more, as I saw someone had reviewed that the waistband was sewn on theirs backwards. The ruffles do go in the back, so it creates a bustle in the back - it’s supposed to be that way, the bustle doesn’t go in the front.
I am a volunteer at a museum.  This skirt will add nicely to my costume.  We dress in 1800’s costumes.

It’s very comfortable and fits true to size. The ruffles aren’t raised up in the front like shown on the picture, but you could pin it up. I’ll just leave it. I am wearing a petticoat (not included) underneath. I’m 5’9” and it’s barely long enough on me so anyone taller will want to pass.

Not bad for a costume piece! I flipped it around so the gathers are in the back and added some extra layers and padding to make it more a Victorian bustle skirt. It’s not historically very accurate, but it’s perfect for the price.

I needed a skirt for a Nadja costume (What We Do In The Shadows). This skirt exceeded my expectations by far. Much better quality than you would expect for two or three times the cost. It's nice and billowy (no need for slip or underskirt) and the bustling is easy to do. It's flattering for plus-size figures. And, it's sized perfectly true to size. DO NOT HESITATE to buy this skirt!
Thougt it was  cotton and it's not.
I bought mine last minute for a party and it came very quickly. Super worth the price
Fit perfect and great material

The black and white looked more like a light grey and white.. other than that it was very comfortable and I loved the skirt. I returned it because the color wasn’t right. I plan to reorder the skirt in a different color later down the road.
It was perfect for my son’s Memorial service

评论概述: Over all the skirt was great and I’d buy it again!

Skirt is NOT the same as pictures.it is super simple and does NOT HAVE the front ruching design. It’s looks like the back all the way around. And for a 5’6” person it’s short. The skirt is not what is pictured. I’m sorry. That Is really BAD

It is full and lovely. I plan to where it when I go shopping cuz I like how they dressed in 1870’s. I got a small and it fit perfectly. My waist is 27. It is stretch so if my waist was 28 it still fit. The hem came to the top of my flat shoes and I’m 5 ft 2in. I love it❤️
I bought these for informal Victorian days in my town. I also plan to wear them to summer picnics and get together’s because they are cool. Well made.
Nice material.  Very pleased that this shirt was lined.

评论概述: Good fit, sturdy construction, as advertised
评论详情: I was happy to say this fit well, true to size, and was well-constructed. I am a 2X and it is cut to fit American women. Plus-sized gals can feel secure that a 2X or a 3X actually IS that size. Cannot say how happy I am, after having to send other so-called Plus Sized garments back. The ruffling is generous, no skimping here .
Purchased for Victorian tea costume .

评论概述: Great product! Excellent quality! Sized exactly as expected
评论详情: Excellent quality!

Loved the skirt. I bought it as a back up for a costume and was thankful I did because the zipper broke in the other skirt.  Everyone thought it looked authentic.  The stripes look more gray than black though.
This product is very comfortable. Don't see many skirts like this anymore. It is eye-catching and quit flattering. A good buy.

There isn't very much stretch in the waist so I wasn't sure it was going to fit (I have a booty).  I realized I had to put the skirt over my head to be wearable.  It did fit just wish it had more stretch so it could get over my booty.
I love the skirt! It looks great, it's comfortable, and I got a lot of compliments. My only complaint is that the skirt is a little noisy when it rustles, but it's really not a big deal.
Cowgirl attire extraordinaire!
It was such a good quality for the price! Would be excellent for high school or civic center plays and makes a great Halloween costume!!

评论概述: The black is more of a gray. Runs more true to size
评论详情: The skirt is very nice! I bought the black and its more gray. The quality is great but the waist band on mine was sewn opposite side of the ruffles. The front waist band is the smoother side but mine came with the high ruffles on the back instead of the front which means it was sewn backwards. I brought size large. It seems like a size medium would possibly be a little snug but the large gave me a little extra room. I am 5'4, 150 pounds, and wear size 8 jeans. The length was perfect on the large and didn't drag on the floor. After all is said and done, I would recommend this skirt.
Bought black and white-2, it is grey and white. Overall I like the skirt but am disappointed in the color.

Ordered the Black and White 2...... it is a light black practically grey. Won’t match my blacker jacket. The skirt quality is very nice, craftsmanship is excellent even though color is wrong. I’ll keep it because it is pretty and nicely made.
